rows.label: qst650109_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, T-elos Re:, can I ask you something?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0002
rows.name:
You're obviously really powerful.
But wouldn't it be even more effective
to work with us instead of alone?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0003
rows.name: I am working with you.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0004
rows.name: Well, technically, I suppose...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0005
rows.name: What's the issue?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0006
rows.name:
Fighting is a tough business.
I understand that you gotta be,
y'know, merciless or whatever.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0007
rows.name:
But outside of battle...
I wish you'd just relax and
have fun with us sometimes.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0008
rows.name:
Drivers and Blades can support each
other in a bunch of ways. Not just
during battle, you know?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0009
rows.name: I understand.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0010
rows.name: Your concerns have been noted.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0011
rows.name:
However, there is no reason to
alter my present behavior.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0012
rows.name: Somehow I knew you'd say that...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0013
rows.name: Heh.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0014
rows.name:
I shall consider whether your
suggestion could be implemented
in future.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0015
rows.name:
Thanks T-elos Re:!
That's good enough for me.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0016
rows.name: Hey, T-elos Re:, can I ask something?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0017
rows.name:
You're super powerful and all that,
but don't you think it'd be better
to work with us instead of alone?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0018
rows.name: I am working with you.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0019
rows.name: Well, I guess...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0020
rows.name: What's the issue?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0021
rows.name:
Look, I get that you gotta do
your serious thing during battle.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0022
rows.name:
But outside of battle, it'd be nice
if you could just kick back and
spend time with the rest of us.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0023
rows.name:
Drivers and Blades can support each
other in a bunch of ways. Not just
during battle, you know?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0024
rows.name: I understand.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0025
rows.name: Your concerns have been noted.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0026
rows.name:
However, there is no reason to
alter my present behavior.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0027
rows.name: I knew you'd say that...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0028
rows.name: Heh.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0029
rows.name:
I shall consider whether your
suggestion could be implemented
in future.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0030
rows.name:
That's all I could ask for!
Cheers, T-elos Re:!

rows.label: qst650109_msg0031
rows.name: I have a question, T-elos Re:.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0032
rows.name:
You are very powerful. No doubt about
it. But don't you think it would be even
more effective to work with us?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0033
rows.name: I am working with you.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0034
rows.name: Well, yes...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0035
rows.name: What's the issue?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0036
rows.name:
Like you, I cannot abide foolishness
during battle. Trust me on that.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0037
rows.name:
But I learned something traveling
with Rex and the others.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0038
rows.name:
Drivers and Blades can support each
other in a myriad ways. Outside of
battle, too - not just while fighting.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0039
rows.name: I understand.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0040
rows.name: Your concerns have been noted.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0041
rows.name:
However, there is no reason to
alter my present behavior.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0042
rows.name:
Perhaps you do not, in fact,
understand.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0043
rows.name: Heh.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0044
rows.name:
I shall consider whether your
suggestion could be implemented
in the future.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0045
rows.name:
My thanks.
That will have to do.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0046
rows.name: T-elos Re:, got a bit of a question for ya.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0047
rows.name:
You're pretty powerful and all that,
but wouldn't it be better if you...
worked with us a bit more?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0048
rows.name: I am working with you.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0049
rows.name: Yeah, I suppose so...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0050
rows.name: What's the issue?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0051
rows.name:
Look, everyone knows that one of
the jobs of a Blade is to protect
their Driver.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0052
rows.name:
But that's only part of it. You're our
mate, T-elos Re:. There's more to being
part of the team than just fighting.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0053
rows.name:
Drivers and Blades can support each
other in a bunch of other ways.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0054
rows.name: I understand.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0055
rows.name: Your concerns have been noted.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0056
rows.name:
However, there is no reason to
alter my present behavior.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0057
rows.name: I had a feeling you'd say that.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0058
rows.name: Heh.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0059
rows.name:
I shall consider whether your
suggestion could be implemented
in the future.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0060
rows.name:
Cheers, T-elos Re:.
Not much more I can ask.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0101
rows.name:
T-elos Re:. Your foolhardy actions before
were inexcusable.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0102
rows.name: Heh. It's amusing to hear that from you.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0103
rows.name:
I act efficiently according to the best
analysis of the data. You act according
to your own reckless desires.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0104
rows.name:
Your treatment of those people was
unwarranted.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0105
rows.name:
We are simply incompatible, you and I.
It is pointless trying to see eye to eye.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0106
rows.name: Acknowledged.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0107
rows.name: But our goals are aligned.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0108
rows.name: Unfortunately, you have a point.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0109
rows.name:
If we encounter a similar situation in
the future, I advise working together
to resolve it.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0110
rows.name: Heh.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0111
rows.name:
Aw, T-elos Re: and KOS-MOS RE: Re:, it's great to
see you guys getting along!

rows.label: qst650109_msg0112
rows.name: I do not think we are getting along.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0113
rows.name:
Agreed. "Getting along" is the opposite
of what we're doing.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0114
rows.name: See?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0117
rows.name:
Aw, T-elos Re: and KOS-MOS RE: Re:, it's great to
see you guys settling your differences!

rows.label: qst650109_msg0118
rows.name:
I do not think we are settling our
differences.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0119
rows.name:
Agreed. Our differences are
irreconcilable.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0120
rows.name: See? Two peas in a pod.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0123
rows.name:
T-elos Re: and KOS-MOS RE: Re:, you are
surprisingly similar.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0124
rows.name: I do not think we are similar.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0125
rows.name:
Agreed. Our differences are
irreconcilable.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0126
rows.name: See what I mean?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0129
rows.name:
T-elos Re: and KOS-MOS RE: Re:, it's great to
see you guys settling your differences.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0130
rows.name:
I do not think we are settling our
differences.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0131
rows.name:
Agreed. Our differences are
irreconcilable.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0132
rows.name: See? Two peas in a pod.
